channel.title: Class Suggestion Template
channel.description:
The following is the template I use for making class cards when I do my suggestions, which I believe makes them easy to read. (Note: I didn't create the layout, I believe that honour goes to @Jazz) Additionally, I have an automatic card maker that fills your choices in to the format automatically [here](http://puu.sh/Ax2nE/391a6a63ea.html). This was originally made by NuclearBurrito, with modifications to my format and extra bells and whistles by me.
``` > # [color=INSERTFACTIONCOLORHERE]The NAMEOFCLASS[/color] > **[color=INSERTFACTIONCOLORHERE]FACTION TYPE[/color]** **PASSIVE (Passive)** - PASSIVE. **DAY ABILITY (Day)** - DAY ABILITY. - x uses **NIGHT ABILITY (Night)** - NIGHT ABILITY. - x uses *GOAL.* ``` This prints something like this: > # [color=white]The NAMEOFCLASS[/color] > **[color=white]FACTION TYPE[/color]** **PASSIVE (Passive)** - PASSIVE. **DAY ABILITY (Day)** - DAY ABILITY. - x uses **NIGHT ABILITY (Night)** - NIGHT ABILITY. - x uses *GOAL.*
From there, you can give the class a name, faction and type, add colours, add in passives and abilities and set an objective.
These are the colours used for specific factions: **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon[/color]** (`[color=steblue]INSERT TEXT[/color]`) **[color=purple]Unseen[/color]** (`[color=purple]INSERT TEXT[/color]`) **[color=darkred]Cult[/color]** (`[color=darkred]INSERT TEXT[/color]`) **[color=gray]Neutral[/color]** (`[color=gray]INSERT TEXT[/color]`), although you can give a neutral class any colour for it's name
These are the objectives for BD/Unseen/Cult: Blue Dragon: Your objective is to defeat the Unseen or Cult, and any neutrals that seek to do you harm. Unseen: Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm. Cult: Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.
If the class is Unique or Guaranteed, you use an emoji: :shield: `:shield:` for Unique :crossed_swords: `:crossed_swords:` for Guaranteed
And when you put it all together, you can get something like: > # [color=steblue]The Butler[/color] > **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Offensive[/color]** **Dutiful (Passive)** - Immune to being occupied at night and immune to target changing. **Nightshade Wine (Day)** - You will poison the King, causing him to die in one night if not healed by a Physician or an Alchemist. If the King is a member of the Blue Dragon, you will take your own life. - 1 use **Serve Wine (Night)** - Occupy a player by getting them drunk. The Butler will be notified if the target cannot be occupied, as they will refuse the wine. - Infinite uses **Concentrated Wine (Night)** - Throw a party, occupying all players who visit you tonight. Bypasses occupy immunity. - 2 uses _Your objective is to defeat the Unseen or Cult, and any neutrals that seek to do you harm._
